   10 rem hardcopy c64 und gemini-10x
   15 rem mit star-universal-interface
   20 for i=828 to 943
   30 read x:pokei,x:s=s+x:next i
   40 data76,63,3,32,253,174,32,158,183,32,201,255,169,0,160,32
   50 data133,253,132,254,162,25,160,7,44,160,5,185,160,3,32
   60 data210,255,136,16,247,169,40,133,21,169,128,133,151,169
   70 data0,133,20,160,7,177,253,37,151,240,7,165,20,25,168,3
   80 data133,20,136,16,240,165,20,32,210,255,70,151,144,225
   90 data165,253,105,7,133,253,144,2,230,254,198,21,208,207
  100 data202,208,189,169,13,32,210,255,76,204,255,1,64,75,27
  110 data13,8,65,27,128,64,32,16,8,4,2,1
  120 if s<>13426 then print"fehler":stop
  130 print"ok!"
